Class ObjectSpectrumProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.ui.viewers.physics.classical.waves.ObjectSpectrumProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpectrumProvider
public class ObjectSpectrumProvider extends Object implements SpectrumProvider
Object-based Spectrum Provider. Uses Complex numbers and Vector types to simulate signal processing.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
